messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Introduction - new here
messages.msgSnippet: Thankyou for the welcome. :) Kathy Mom to Logan 14, Andrew 9, Alexander 5 1/2, and announcing the newest addition to our family - Christopher David born
messages.messageBody:
Thankyou for the welcome. :)

Kathy
Mom to Logan 14, Andrew 9, Alexander 5 1/2,
and announcing the newest addition to our family -
Christopher David born 9/20/2001, 4:14pm,
7 pounds 4 oz, 19 3/4 inches long.
Pro: Breastfeeding, childled weaning, Whole Food eating, cloth diapering,
Attachment Parenting, and Unschooling/Homeschooling.
----WAHMall Screen name (mom2fourboys) Ebay Screen Name (Mom2boyss)

"Some people think we put our lives on hold to raise a child, but we know
that to hold a child IS life"
----- Original Message -----
From: "Fetteroll" <fetteroll@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 29, 2002 5:19 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Introduction - new here


> on 4/28/02 10:46 PM, Kathy Sullivan at mom2fourboys@... wrote:
>
> > Christopher David
>
> That's the name we had picked out for a boy. :-)
>
> And Kathryn (Anneliese Terezia Renata Danica Britta Kinsey) for the girl
we
> did have. (One name from each of the countries of origin of her
ancestors.)
>
> Welcome Kathy!
>
> Joyce
>
>
>
> ~~~ Don't forget! If you change the topic, change the subject line! ~~~

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Introduction - new here
messages.msgSnippet: ... That s the name we had picked out for a boy. :-) And Kathryn (Anneliese Terezia Renata Danica Britta Kinsey) for the girl we did have. (One name from each
messages.messageBody:
on 4/28/02 10:46 PM, Kathy Sullivan at mom2fourboys@... wrote:

> Christopher David

That's the name we had picked out for a boy. :-)

And Kathryn (Anneliese Terezia Renata Danica Britta Kinsey) for the girl we
did have. (One name from each of the countries of origin of her ancestors.)

Welcome Kathy!

Joyce

messages.subject: Introduction - new here
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I am Kathy (a lurker coming out) married to Paul, and together we have 4 wonderful sons. Logan 14, Andrew 9, Alexander 5 (6 in two weeks), and Christopher
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
I am Kathy (a lurker coming out) married to Paul, and together we have 4 wonderful sons. Logan 14, Andrew 9, Alexander 5 (6 in two weeks), and Christopher 7 months.
We live in Mesquite Texas.

Can't wait to get to "know" you all.

Kathy
Mom to Logan 14, Andrew 9, Alexander 5 1/2,
and announcing the newest addition to our family -
Christopher David born 9/20/2001, 4:14pm,
7 pounds 4 oz, 19 3/4 inches long.
Pro: Breastfeeding, childled weaning, Whole Food eating, cloth diapering, Attachment Parenting, and Unschooling/Homeschooling.
----WAHMall Screen name (mom2fourboys) Ebay Screen Name (Mom2boyss)

"Some people think we put our lives on hold to raise a child, but we know that to hold a child IS life"


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
